name: Tever
description:
Movement: WASD 

Shoot: Left Mouse Button 

Tether: Right Mouse Button (When enemies are at half health)

Untether: Space (when hovering over tethered enemy) 

Premise: Wave based game about tethering to your enemies to increase your strength. Kill for health drops. If any of your tethers die, you all die.

The WebGL build sometimes crashes, either reload the page or download the exe (https://www.dropbox.com/s/oz95af6nlh3x1k7/Tever%28exe%29.zip?dl=0).
